title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Flexible Higher Education Vocational Program Design: Math Teacher Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level mathematics foundational knowledge and basic lesson design skills for pre-service teachers
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Designing three or more mathematics education modules tailored to learner needs via process-oriented demand analysis.
Proposing five or more applicable teaching methodologies for mobile microlearning environments in mathematics.

Learners establish over 3 evaluation criteria for educational program flexibility (e.g., situational responsiveness, resource utilization, time efficiency) using a simulation-based learning model (e.g., VR customer response scenarios) within a week and develop a 5-point scale checklist for each criterion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
